arts.ttl: Loan deal done, Arkell Jude-Boyd redeems himself after late arrival and impressive home form - Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn after Chesterfield win
arts.sum: We weren't camped in our own half, but we were in our half a lot more than I would have liked against a very, very good Chesterfield team. I look at ourselves first and we have been off it, maybe looked a bit flat at times, but we had a long trip Tuesday night to Accrington, tough game against Salford on the Saturday, so we have beaten two very good teams here now and it goes to show we are moving in the right direction.

arts.ttl: Cheltenham Town v Chesterfield RECAP: Late Arkell Jude-Boyd strike seals home win for Robins
arts.sum: Cheltenham Town: Day; Jude-Boyd (Power 90+5), Stubbs, Bennett (Adedokun 17), Bradbury; Kinsella, Young; Thomas (Bakare 90+5), Backwell (E Williams 67), Archer; Hay (Miller 67). Arkell Jude-Boyd's 92nd minute goal sealed a dramatic home victory for Cheltenham Town against Chesterfield in League Two on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Arkell Jude-Boyd nets last-gasp winner as Cheltenham edge Chesterfield
arts.sum: Jude-Boyd netted in the second minute of added time to seal the points and extend their unbeaten run to three games.

arts.ttl: Missed opportunity to win scrappy game, new signings before weekend and praise for centre-backs - Cheltenham Town manager Michael Flynn after Accrington Stanley draw
arts.sum: Scot's header from about a yard, Bradbury misses the target from five yards and George should do better the one in the first half. Yes. and we should have won with the three chances.

arts.ttl: Lincoln City man was wanted by League Two side before Chesterfield move
arts.sum: Lincoln City winger Dylan Duffy was wanted by Morecambe before his move to Chesterfield, the Shrimps’ boss Derek… The post Lincoln City man was wanted by League Two side before Chesterfield move appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

Cheltenham's 0-0 draw with Accrington in midweek made it just one defeat in their last five games and just two defeats in their last 12. Chesterfield finally got their first win in seven as they beat...
